attributes.action: Job Seeker Alowance For British People
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why after many years of paying taxes and then starting my own bussiness then going back into full time employment. Then being unemployed again, do I get no help from my own goverment? but incomer do, now I am 56yrs old and not a chance of getting employment and about to lose my home, is this fair. I think not so what can we do, oh I see let have a pay rise for the oxygen thieves at the top of all sectors. I soon will be homeless, then what? silly is it not.
Action:- Repair the damage this causes to the Goverments reputation on the older person.
Action:- Fix the stupid rules set out to destroy peoples lives.
Action:- Equal right for the workers of this destroyed land by the stupid old fashion ideals, might is not always right.

rejection.details: This page tells you how to appeal against a decision about Job Seekers Allowance:  http://www.direct.gov.uk/en/MoneyTaxAndBenefits/BenefitsTaxCreditsAndOtherSupport/BeginnersGuideToBenefits/DG_10013949
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
